Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Medical District.
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Medical District. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Medical District.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
